entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 1:49 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
